title: Water birds of the inland
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Malcolm Otton, Lilias Castle and Norman Castle
brief_description: Shows general feeding and nesting habits of a variety of inland water birds at Narran Lake, Western NSW (also known as Terewah Lake) and its surrounding marshy area.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Malcolm Otton, Lilias Castle and Norman Castle
description: Shows general feeding and nesting habits of a variety of inland water birds at Narran Lake, Western NSW (also known as Terewah Lake) and its surrounding marshy area.
